main event: Five round, very brilliant objects in echelon formation were observed circling and then going away in Central Fort Lauderdale, Florida on October 28, 1957.
interesting points: The objects seemed to follow a cargo plane, and two of them continued westward.
The objects were described as being 'very brilliant' and circling the area.
Possible explanations included balloons, extraterrestrial devices, or aircraft.
The investigator's attention was not invited until about 15 minutes after the objects were no longer visible.
sighted object: five round, very brilliant objects in echelon formation
